questions.question: Inheritance among classes are represented by a

answers.a: Solid line from the extending to the extended class
answers.b: Line with an unfilled arrow head from the extending to the extended class
answers.c: Line with a filled diamond from the extending to the extended class
answers.d: Dotted line with extend stereotype from the extending to the extended class

questions.question: Private members (or methods) in a class are indicated with a
In UML 2.0 a synchronous message is represented with a
An object can send a synchronous message and multiple asynchronous message in parallel
